statements: SELECT * FROM meetings
SELECT meeting_id, organizer_name, meeting_date FROM meetings
SELECT agenda_title, agenda_description FROM meetings WHERE meeting_date = '2022-10-15'
SELECT * FROM meetings WHERE organizer_name LIKE '%John%'
SELECT agenda_description, agenda_title, organizer_name, meeting_date FROM meetings ORDER BY meeting_date DESC
SELECT * FROM meetings WHERE organizer_name = 'John Smith' ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT agenda_title, agenda_description FROM meetings WHERE meeting_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY meeting_id;
SELECT * FROM meetings WHERE organizer_name = 'Alice Johnson' AND meeting_date >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY meeting_date ASC;
SELECT organizer_name, meeting_date, agenda_title FROM meetings WHERE agenda_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY organizer_name, meeting_date DESC;
SELECT meeting_id, agenda_title FROM meetings WHERE organizer_name IN ('John Smith', 'Alice Johnson') ORDER BY meeting_id ASC, organizer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM meetings WHERE meeting_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT meeting_topic, meeting_date FROM meetings WHERE meeting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT meeting_topic, meeting_date, meeting_time FROM meetings WHERE organizer_id = 12345;
SELECT meeting_topic, meeting_date, meeting_time, organizer_id FROM meetings ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT meeting_date, meeting_time, organizer_id FROM meetings WHERE organizer_id IN (54321, 67890);
SELECT * FROM meetings WHERE meeting_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY meeting_date ASC;
SELECT meeting_topic, organizer_id FROM meetings WHERE meeting_topic LIKE '%Project%' AND organizer_id = 123;
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_topic, COUNT(*) as agenda_count FROM meetings JOIN agendas ON meetings.meeting_id = agendas.meeting_id GROUP BY meeting_id;
SELECT meeting_date, COUNT(*) as agenda_count FROM meetings LEFT JOIN agendas ON meetings.meeting_id = agendas.meeting_id GROUP BY meeting_date HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT meeting_topic, organizer_id, assigned_to FROM meetings LEFT JOIN agendas ON meetings.meeting_id = agendas.meeting_id WHERE due_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM meetings;
SELECT title, date, location FROM meetings;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM meetings;
SELECT meeting_id, title, organizer FROM meetings WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT a.name, a.email, a.role, m.title FROM attendees a JOIN meetings m ON a.meeting_id = m.meeting_id;
SELECT * FROM meetings;
SELECT title, date, organizer FROM meetings ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM attendees WHERE role = 'Attendee';
SELECT meeting_id, topic FROM agendas WHERE topic LIKE '%important%';
SELECT m.title, a.name, ag.topic FROM meetings m JOIN attendees a ON m.meeting_id = a.meeting_id JOIN agendas ag ON m.meeting_id = ag.meeting_id;
SELECT * FROM meetings;
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_location, meeting_date FROM meetings ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM attendees WHERE meeting_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM agendas WHERE meeting_id = 3 ORDER BY agenda_id ASC;
SELECT note_content, note_date FROM notes WHERE meeting_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM meetings WHERE meeting_location='Conference Room 1';
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_date, meeting_time FROM meetings WHERE meeting_date>'2022-01-01';
SELECT attendees.attendee_name, meetings.meeting_date FROM attendees JOIN meetings ON attendees.meeting_id = meetings.meeting_id;
SELECT agenda_topic, agenda_description FROM agendas WHERE meeting_id=1 ORDER BY agenda_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT note_date FROM notes WHERE note_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM MeetingSchedule;
SELECT topic, date, start_time FROM MeetingSchedule WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT agenda_item, presenter FROM MeetingAgenda ORDER BY presenter ASC;
SELECT name, email, role FROM Attendees WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT note FROM MeetingNotes WHERE meeting_id = 1001 ORDER BY note_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM MeetingSchedule;
SELECT meeting_id, date, topic FROM MeetingSchedule WHERE topic='Agenda Preparation';
SELECT meeting_id, start_time, end_time FROM MeetingSchedule ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT agenda_item, presenter, time_actual FROM MeetingAgenda WHERE time_actual > time_estimated;
SELECT name, email, role FROM Attendees WHERE meeting_id=1001;
